name: PaintMusic (Oculus Quest)
description:
PaintMusic is a VR art & music game where players can "draw their music" and "play their drawings." (Currently, the game can be played with only Oculus Quest or Oculus Quest 2)

Followings are features, which can be enjoyed and experienced through the game.

* DRAW & PLAY MODE

* VARIOUS INSTRUMENTS

* CUSTOMIZE COLORS

* LOOP STATION

* TUTORIAL

* SAVE & LOAD

More Videos

If you have any questions, please contact at lefthanddeveloper@gmail.com
